name: Cobalt
title: cobalt.tools
payoff: Save anything from the web easily.
shortDescription: Cobalt is a versatile web app designed to help users save multimedia content like videos, audio, photos, and GIFs from their favorite websites simply by pasting a link. It's crafted to serve artists, educators, and content creators, providing a tool free from ads, trackers, and malware. An example use case is when a user needs to download video and audio channels separately; Cobalt processes these on-the-fly without saving to disk, ensuring privacy and efficiency.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: JDownloader
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Supports bulk downloads and many sites.
